mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order (order_id, order_type, order_number, goods_name, goods_weight, mailer_name, mailer_address, mailer_phone, receiver_name, receiver_type, receiver_address, receiver_phone, start_city, middle_city, end_city, transport_price, distribution_price, carriage_price, total_price, vehicle_id, order_remarks ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distributionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carriagePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select order_id, order_type, order_number, goods_name, goods_weight, mailer_name, mailer_address, mailer_phone, receiver_name, receiver_type, receiver_address, receiver_phone, start_city, middle_city, end_city, transport_price, distribution_price, carriage_price, total_price, vehicle_id, order_remarks from order
